column4: AD account and VPN Access form required for new hire
Email account req'd - remedy ticket to ME-EXCH
AD account required - personal storage space

column2: Orange boxes denote an additional actions that must be performed: e.g.  selecting a UNIX server, choosing an additional required account type, filling out an additional form
column3: Dark green boxes are instruction/description fields
column4: Aqua is a section break or notes for what the account process is after a user is created
column5: Light Blue are DSG names/Group owners to be copied to the DSGroups tabs if you select that application.
